entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 08:24 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 4.7°C
Wind: WSW 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 over exposed areas early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
